Russell Gold wrote:
> On Fri, 12 Nov 2004 12:51:21 -0000, thecyriuz82 <thecyriuz82@...> 
> wrote:
>  > I have a question concerning HttpUnit. I have to write my Diploma and
>  > to use HttpUnit in it. So my question: Are there any books or workouts
>  > which describes HttpUnit?
>  > Unfortunately I found not very much about HttpUnit.
> 
> Well, nobody has asked me to write "HttpUnit in Action" yet... :)

You mean Manning hasn't called?!

To the original questioner:

The book "XP in Practice" includes testing a web application, although I 
remember not being entirely impressed with the example.

_JUnit Recipes_ talks about testing web applications and web components, 
but uses HtmlUnit, Cactus and ServletUnit; but not HttpUnit. (Sorry, 
Russell.)

Do you need specifically HttpUnit information, or simply information on 
testing web applications? If you need specific information on HttpUnit, 
you'll have to collect it from the web, including Russell's site.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
